text: N’iyo bagezweho n’inkuru itanga ihumure cyangwa ikangaranya (abantu) barayisakaza; nyamara iyo baza kuyigarura ku ntumwa (Muhamadi) n’abayobozi muri bo, rwose abasesenguzi muri bo bari kuyisobanukirwa (bakareba niba ari ngombwa kuyisakaza cyangwa niba atari ngombwa). Nyamara iyo bitaza kuba ingabire n’impuhwe bya Allah kuri mwe, mwari gukurikira Shitani usibye bake muri mwe
